website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering for kids who enjoy playhouses and Sesame Street; however its durability and longevity is questionable for kids who like to engage in rigorous play.
pros: Sesame Street-themed play tent that features Mr. Hooper's store and graphics of popular characters
4 foot interior can fit several kids
Easy to pop up and fold down, and is compact and easy to store when not in use
cons: Material and structure are somewhat flimsy, so it's not designed for rough play

customer_reviews.title: The tent is adorable, the only drawback is the round play area ...
customer_reviews.text: The tent is adorable, the only drawback is the round play area that velcrows on. There is a plastic pole that supports the front that can be dangerous if they lean or jump on or near it. Overall, for the money, its worth it though. We put a pillow and all his Sesame Street Plush Characters inside and there was still room for him to crawl through. There is also rings to attach his money tunnel (also purchased on Amazon). The price is right, and it looks awesome with his Elmo Couch! If your child loves Sesame Street, get it !
customer_reviews.author: Vickey

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy! No structure!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Sesame Street and tents. Both in one right? Wrong. This “tent” collapsed every single time she tried to get in and out of it, no hardware to add structure. Basically a wall decoration now for her to see the characters and bought a REAL tent!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: great addition to my sons sesame street toys!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old loves his sesame street play house!!! he loves crawling in and out and playing peek a boo through the door flaps! he giggles and grins from ear to ear as he runs in and out and points out all the characters on the store! I’m so happy with this purchase! I want there to be more pieces so i can add onto it, it is just velcro!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: My son absolutely adores this. He will just run ...
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely adores this. He will just run in and out of it. The doorways trip him up though and he fell and hit his head. Other than that it's cute!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Davis

customer_reviews.title: The material is pretty thin and may rip if kids get too rough ...
customer_reviews.text: The material is pretty thin and may rip if kids get too rough with it. But it's really cute and easy to put together. For the most part I'm really satisfied with it. It's also bigger than I expected. I mean it's not gigantic but the height comes up to my chest.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: I think our dogs like it more as it topples over easily
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy-- no weight can support this but with a bit of DIY you can improve the stability... just trying to be positive. Our 10 month old loves drawing through and walking in and out. I think our dogs like it more as it topples over easily.
customer_reviews.author: TTT

customer_reviews.title: Grandkid loves it, i figure that's what counts. ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandkid loves it, i figure that's what counts. That and the fact she hasn't been able to ruin it yet though it has been only a couple of weeks since she's gotten it. Thought it a bit flimsy myself but not being able to fit in the thing i can't tell how it'd hold up if i played in it 8>)
customer_reviews.author: rivvir

customer_reviews.title: Great for any Sesame Street loving tot!
customer_reviews.text: Good size for any size house! Bought for my 2 year old and he loves it. I like how you can detach the front piece.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria K

customer_reviews.title: Fun little house.
customer_reviews.text: Fun playhouse. My 18 month old loves it but since she isn't walking yet she tumbles into the sides. Now the sides are somewhat permanently damaged and it no longer stand unassisted. But I got this on sale so overall it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: mandyself

customer_reviews.title: It's super cute, but very un-sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It's super cute, but very un-sturdy. I have seen better. And it velcros together in the front, and constantly comes undone.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Edelman

customer_reviews.title: ... at my grandsons 2nd birthday and all the kids loved it. Took some great pictures
customer_reviews.text: Used at my grandsons 2nd birthday and all the kids loved it. Took some great pictures. Now he plays in it all the time. He's an Elmo fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking play tent
customer_reviews.text: Good looking play tent. But i wish it has the buttom part. I just put it indoor otherwise it blowup if i put it outside. It is a light weight play house tent. Easy to put it. But a little-bit having hardtime to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie Me

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Kids played in it for like a week  before it could stay up
customer_reviews.text: You can find better ones. Less than 3 weeks and it won't stand up right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price .. bought it for my sons birthday party (Sesame Street theme).. it was a hit and could take all the abuse of the toddlers being ruffeith it now we have it set up in his room..when he's missing he's in there
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It could use a window so little ones can see out.
customer_reviews.text: The 2 year old is a bit intimidated right now but will love it when she is ready to hide and play
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: Made very flimsy and missing a piece to help hold it together. Would not recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Yager

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Only the sides shown in the picture are printed with images. The other two sides are yellow. And inside is yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Linzertart

customer_reviews.title: Not Built to Last
customer_reviews.text: Shoddy workmanship on the doorways. My toddler started ripping the panel day one without even trying to. Also, if you notice there are two sides of the tent that are never shown in any of the pictures. There's a reason for this, both of those sides are completely blank! not a huge deal if you're sticking it in a corner like I have, but still, pretty sneaky if you ask me. However, my toddler absolutely loves it, so I guess I'll give a star for that.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your $
customer_reviews.text: Won't stand up on its Own. We’ve had several pop up tents & all were more sturdy, durable and attractive. Looks like a dollar store purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rattaran

customer_reviews.title: Wish there was more sesame street designs on more than ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish there was more sesame street designs on more than just the two sides but overall it's a cute play tent
customer_reviews.author: SnoBlink

customer_reviews.title: Sesame street tent
customer_reviews.text: My son really loves sesame street tent. What I dislike is that it's not sturdy and got bent in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Anuszewski

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson love this play hut! Very flimsy but he and his little buddies love it. Happy Grandma
customer_reviews.author: Diane Agnesi

customer_reviews.title: but it is durable and adorable. My son lives it
customer_reviews.text: I used it as a decoration for a 1st bday party. It's a little flimsy so needs additional support, but it is durable and adorable. My son lives it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The loop & hook tabs are on the wrong side ...
customer_reviews.text: The loop & hook tabs are on the wrong side of the store. It will connect.... but not very well..... and with kids --- not for long
customer_reviews.author: Mik

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my god daughter and her sister love playing in this!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... got this for a 2-year old and she absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a 2-year old and she absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Well loved
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our little grand niece, she absolutely loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark K.

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to move and put together
customer_reviews.text: My son loves playing in this tent! It's easy to move and put together.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great price for hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! Great price for hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: claire straughn

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: She loves it! I can fit in there with her and we'll read books and do puzzles.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for my Nephew's birthday party. The sides shown in the picture are the only ones with graphics, the other two sides are plain. The front part of the tent is attached by velcro so it can be used with or without it. Overall it is the same quality tent as any other kids pop up tent and considering it is Sesame street and usually products with licensed characters are marked up in price considerably, this was a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has played and played and played with this. She is 19 months old and has had a lot fun. It is a little flimsy but you get what you pay for. I wasn't expecting to get a playhouse that she could climb on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves. I just wish you could choose which opening to hook up the outside piece.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Sim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The tent is fun to play with, it’s light and flexible
customer_reviews.author: Olga Claussen

product_meta.title: Playhut Sesame Street Hooper's Store Play Tent
product_meta.description: Only Playhut structures provide children with hours of interactive adventure. EZ Twist technology allows for instant setup and quick fold-down, make our products portable and EZ to store. Children can imagine themselves playing with their favorite characters!
feature_bullets: Patented EZ Twist Technology allows for instant set up and easy storage
Split flap door allows for easy access Comfortably fits up to 2 kids
Tunnel port provides crawl through fun!
Mesh window allows for peek through fun
Light weight and portable Take it anywhere you go!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars67 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
